questions.text: Explain the difference between renewable and non-renewable energy sources, giving two examples of each.
What is photosynthesis and why is it important for life on Earth?
Describe the water cycle and its main stages.
What are the three states of matter? Give an example of each and explain how they differ.
Explain Newton's First Law of Motion and provide a real-life example.
What causes the seasons on Earth?
Describe the structure of an atom and name its three main subatomic particles.
What is the difference between series and parallel circuits? Draw a simple diagram for each.
Explain how vaccines work to protect us from diseases.
What is climate change and what are its main causes?
